Text: PUC Staffs Second List of Questions for January Technical Con ference Cc another list of ten questions to those who attended todays prehearing conference at the PUC regarding Docket No ERCOT Protocols A copy is attached for your information that includes a question related to confidential documents filed by ERCOT ERCOT did not object to sharing this question with you You may remember that an early commitment was made on behalf of ERCOT to file written answers to question numbers through of Staffs first list of ten questions You got that list as an attachment to my earlier email on January Today we also requested that written answers to be filed by ERCOT on January to cover question numbers in this attachment In addition a draft copy of a paper by Dr Shams Siddiqi ERCOT Local Congestion Management Potential for Market Abuse was distributed today to facilitate related discussion on January Unfortunately I do not have an electronic copy of that paper to share with you See you on January Technical Conference Parviz Adib Ph D Director of Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas N Congress Avenue PO Box Austin Texas Ph No Fax No email See attached file TechnicalConferenceMaindoc TechnicalConferenceMaindoc
